dataset_id: MODIS/Terra Monthly Vegetation Indices Global 1x1 degree V005 (MODVI) at GES DISC
title: MODIS/Terra Monthly Vegetation Indices Global 1x1 degree V005 (MODVI) at GES DISC
summary: The global monthly gridded MODIS vegetation indices product is derived from the standard 0.05 CMG MODIS Terra Vegetation Indices Monthly product MOD13C2 (Huete et al, 2002) collection-5. The product is generated for Northern Eurasia Earth Science Partnership Initiative (NEESPI) program  in supporting researches on the surface processes and climate modeling. The vegetation indices product is generated at 1x1 degree spatial resolution starting from 2000.
